Description: Nile silt pottery vase, with flat base and flaring upper body, coated with a red slip and burnished. The interior of the rim is also slipped and burnished.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911),, pl. xxxii.64b, but no grave is specified. This pot is Polished red ware P64G in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery.
